import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; const streamers = [ { id: 1, streamer: "Chenny323", title: "HIMOTHY IS REACTINGasdasdasdasdasdasd!!", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 1000, }, { id: 2, streamer: "SweaterGxd", title: "QUICK IRL WITH THE GANG!", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 600 }, { id: 3, streamer: "MarkyNextDoor", title: "Late Night Vibes get in here", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 500 }, { id: 4, streamer: "Kobe0802", title: "Playing games and chilling", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 400 }, { id: 5, streamer: "Camilo", title: "Casamilo in the building!!", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 300 }, { id: 6, streamer: "Camilo", title: "Casamilo in the building!!", thumbnail_url: "https://i.imgur.com/02Qh5Y9.jpg", profilepic_url: "https://i.imgur.com/qRnVmA8.png", viewers: 300 } ] function App() { return (
Da Community
{streamers.map((streamers) =>
window.open(`https://twitch.tv/${streamers.streamer}`)}>
{streamers.viewers} viewers
{streamers.title}


{streamers.streamer}
)}
); } export default App;
